delete_msg_label: Are you sure you want to delete the {{type}} "{{name}}"? This action can't be undone.
teacher_resource: All folders and files uploaded in this section are visible to teachers under the <1> Educator center > Teacher resources </1> on the Toddle web portal.
teacher_school_policies: All folders and files uploaded in this section are visible to teachers under the <1> Educator center > School policies </1> on the Toddle web portal and under more section in Toddle Educator App.
parent_school_policies: All folders and files uploaded in this section are visible to parents under the Parent center > School policies on the Toddle web portal and under the School policies section in Toddle Family app.
no_school_policies: The school hasn't added any school policies yet
delete_warning_message: These items will be permanently removed from all the classes they are shared with and the students will no longer be able to view them.
delete_warning_file_message: This file will be permanently removed from all the classes it is shared with and students will no longer be able to view it.
delete_warning_folder_message: This folder and its contents will be permanently removed from all the classes it is shared with and students will no longer be able to view them.
delete_warning_file_folder_message: This {{type}} will be permanently removed from {{count}} class it is shared with and the students will no longer be able to view it.
delete_warning_file_folder_message_other: This {{type}} will be permanently removed from all the {{count}} classes they are shared with and the students will no longer be able to view them.
delete_warning_items_message: These items will be permanently removed from {{count}} class it is shared with and the students will no longer be able to view them.
delete_warning_items_message_other: These items will be permanently removed from all the {{count}} classes they are shared with and the students will no longer be able to view them.
delete_confirm_selected_items: Are you sure you want to delete the selected items?
delete_confirm_item: Are you sure you want to delete the {{type}} "{{name}}"?
no_files_here_subtext: Press the "+ New" button to add files or folders
teacher_resource_maple_bear: All folders and files uploaded in this section are visible to teachers under the <1> Educator Center > Teacher Resources </1> on the Toddle web portal. Please note- school admins cannot add to folders or delete/ modify any files created by the Maple bear team
teacher_school_policies_maple_bear: All folders and files uploaded in this section are visible to teachers under the <1> Educator Center > School Policies </1> on the Toddle web portal and under more section in Toddle Educator App. Please note- school admins cannot add to folders or delete/ modify any files created by the Maple bear team
parent_school_policies_maple_bear: All folders and files uploaded in this section are visible to parents in the Toddle Educator app <1> (More > School Policies) </1>. Please note- school admins cannot add to folders or delete/ modify any files created by the Maple bear team
admin_resources_maple_bear: Anything uploaded in this section is visible to all schools admins in <1> Admin portal > Educator center > Admin Resources</1>. Please note- Country teams and admins cannot add to folders or delete/ modify any files created by the global team
publish_to_all_region_msg: On clicking “confirm”, all folders and files added, edited or deleted to any regions’ folder will be published
publish_to_region_msg: On clicking “confirm”, all folders and files added, edited or deleted in {{label}} folder will be published
publish_to_country: On clicking “confirm”, all folders and files added, edited or deleted will be published
student_school_policies: All folders and files uploaded in this section are visible to students under the <1> Student center > School policies </1>on the Toddle web portal.
parent_resource: All folders and files uploaded in this section are visible to parents under the <1> Parent center > Parent resources </1> on the Toddle web portal.
student_resource: All folders and files uploaded in this section are visible to students under the <1> Student center > Student resources </1> on the Toddle web portal.
files_folders_sharing_info_text: All users associated with selected grades would be granted access
delete_dialog_confirm_text_with_label: This action cannot be undone. This {{label}} will be permanently removed for all users it is shared with
delete_dialog_multiple_confirm_text_with: This action cannot be undone. These {{label}} will be permanently removed for all users it is shared with
delete_modal_title_confirm_text: Are you sure you want to delete the {{label}} {{name}}?
select_recipients_type_label: Select the type of users you want to share with
delete_dialog_multiple_files_and_folders: Deleting a folder will also remove any files within it. This action cannot be undone and will permanently remove these {{label}} for all shared users.
remove_access_to_folder_and_contents: Remove access to this folder and its contents
removing_access_warning_text_with_folder: Removing access for users or grades from the "{{name}}"  folder will also deny access to all files and folders within for those users.
removing_access_warning_text_for_folders: Removing access for users or grades from {{count}} folders will also deny access to all files and folders within for those users.
shared_policies_and_resources_appear_her: Policies and resources shared with you will appear here
policies_and_resources_yet_to_be_shared: Policies and resources yet to be shared
delete_dialog_multiple_files_confirm_tex: This action cannot be undone and will permanently remove these {{label}} for all shared users.
single_folder_access_modified: Removing access for users or grades from the "{{label}}" folder will also remove access to all files and folders within for those users.
single_file_access_modified: Removing access for all users and grades from the "{{label}}" file
single_entity_access_removed_with_label: Please note- only admins will be able to view this {{label}}
multiple_folders_access_modified_with_la: Removing access for users or grades from {{label}}. This will also remove access to all files and folders within for those users.
multiple_files_access_modified_with_labe: Removing access for users or grades from {{label}}
multiple_folders_access_removed_with_lab: Please note- you are removing access for all users and grades for {{label}}. Only admins will be able to view these files and folders
multiple_files_access_removed_with_label: Please note- you are removing access for all users and grades for {{label}}. Only admins will be able to view these files
remove_access_to_this_folder_and_its_con: Remove access to this folder and its contents
Remove access to {{label}} and its contents
some_files_folder_cannot_be_shared_or_mo: Some files/folders selected cannot be shared or modified
this_cannot_be_shared_or_modified_with_l: This {{label}} cannot be shared or modified
add_resource_to_folder_restriction_label: You cannot add any resources to this folder
disable_publish_info_message: Publishing to schools has been temporarily disabled as we are implementing some new features for the educator center
enter_new_folder_name_placeholder: Enter the new folder name here
